pageContext.claim: “‘General’ McChrystal got fired like a dog by Obama. Last assignment a total bust. Known for big, dumb mouth. Hillary lover!”
pageContext.analysis: Gen. Stanley McChrystal has criticized Trump, as have many other generals. Obama fired McChrystal, who was then commander of U.S. forces in Afghanistan, because the general also made critical comments about Obama administration officials in an interview with Rolling Stone. Trump insinuates that McChrystal failed in Afghanistan, but the same strategy was in place before and after he left. Obama said it was a "change in personnel but it is not a change in policy."
